name: Phill
description:
Phill is a scarily simple submission for the GMTK Game Jam.  You are Phill, and your goal is to eliminate all enemies, called "Walkers," in the field.  You only have ONE tool at your disposal: the mouseclick.  Using it, you can move your character, drop bombs to kill enemies, and temporarily freeze time.

(And let's just cross our fingers this even works.)

Made from scratch using Python.  Font by Roger White.
